Choose one. If you control an artifact creature as you cast this spell, you may choose both instead –
• Target player draws three cards and loses 3 life.
• Up to two target creatures and/or Vehicles become artifact creatures and gain lifelink and deathtouch until end of turn.
notes:
2.2.0: Made a new version of black tar that reads better, is better adjusted for the new soldier tokens, and provides a more dedicated source of card draw for the green-black and white-black archetypes.
2.2.1: Changed again now is an instant speed ambition’s cost on one mode, animates up to two vehicles and gives them lifelink and deathtouch on the other. Also checks for an artifact creature to give both which doesn’t seem that hard to do. Could be up to a 5 for 1 in perfect conditions but I don’t think it will normally be that.
